column4: hmm.. it doesn't really show a newer version either.. in fact, it shows 6.3 .. I must have gotten some deb packages for 6.4
strange  - I thought 6.06 was up to vim 6.4
I'm on an old ubuntu, mnoir.. but even on packages.debian I'm seeing 6.3 ..
oic - well don't mind me - I have 7 installed everywhere
Perhaps even a GUI -- I spend all my time in X or on a windows system anyway.
